饑える: (うえる) - to starve; to thirst; to be hungry
饑死: (かつえじに) - (death from) starvation; starving to death
饑饉: (ききん) - famine; drought; shortage; crop failure
饒舌家: (じょうぜつか) - talkative person; chatterbox
饕餮: (とうてつ) - tao-tie (mythological Chinese creature engraved on bronzeware during the Shang & Zhou dynasties); (used as a metaphor for a) brutal person; coveting of wealth (property, etc.)
饕餮文: (とうてつもん) - tao-tie engraving; figure of a creature of Chinese mythology engraved on bronze ware during the Yin-Chou dynasty
饗す: (きょうす) - to treat; to feast; to provide dinner for
饗する: (きょうする) - to treat; to feast; to provide dinner for
饗応: (きょうおう) - entertainment/treat/feast/banquet; immediately agreeing with someone else
饗設: (あるじもうけ) - entertaining someone as one's guest
饗設け: (あるじもうけ) - entertaining someone as one's guest
首: (pescoço) - neck , neck; head; dismissal, discharge, firing (from a job)
首がすわる: (くびがすわる) - to be able to hold one's head up (of a baby)
首が座る: (くびがすわる) - to be able to hold one's head up (of a baby)
首が据わる: (くびがすわる) - to be able to hold one's head up (of a baby)
首が絞まる: (くびがしまる) - to have one's neck wrung
首が飛ぶ: (くびがとぶ) - to be sacked; to be dismissed
首すじ: (くびすじ) - nape of the neck; back of the neck; scruff of the neck
首ったけ: (くびったけ) - deeply in love with; madly in love with; heads over heels in love with; to be crazy about
首っ丈: (くびったけ) - deeply in love with; madly in love with; heads over heels in love with; to be crazy about
首っ引き: (くびっぴき) - making constant reference to
首にする: (クビにする) - to fire from a job
首になる: (クビになる) - to be sacked/to be fired/to be dismissed; to be beheaded
首に成る: (クビになる) - to be sacked/to be fired/to be dismissed; to be beheaded
首の皮一枚: (くびのかわいちまい) - still having a very small chance; still having a tiny shred of hope
首まき: (くびまき) - comforter; muffler; neckerchief; scarf; neckwear
首をかしげる: (くびをかしげる) - to incline one's head to the side (in doubt); to tilt one's head to the side (in confusion); to be puzzled
首をくくる: (くびをくくる) - to hang oneself; to strangle oneself
首をながくして: (くびをながくして) - looking forward; expectantly; eagerly
首をひねる: (くびをひねる) - to cock one's head in puzzlement; to tilt one's head in contemplation; to wrack one's brain; to think hard
首をやる: (くびをやる) - (usu. figurative) to be hanged; to be struck dead; to eat one's hat
首を傾ける: (くびをかたむける) - to incline one's head
首を傾げる: (くびをかしげる) - to incline one's head to the side (in doubt); to tilt one's head to the side (in confusion); to be puzzled
首を切る: (くびをきる) - to fire from a job/to dismiss/to discharge; to behead
首を垂れる: (こうべをたれる) - to bow one's head; to hang one's head; to droop (e.g. ears of grain)
首を括る: (くびをくくる) - to hang oneself; to strangle oneself
首を振る: (くびをふる) - to shake one's head
首を捻る: (くびをひねる) - to cock one's head in puzzlement; to tilt one's head in contemplation; to wrack one's brain; to think hard
首を揃える: (くびをそろえる) - to get together
首を横に振る: (くびをよこにふる) - to shake one's head
首を洗って待ってろ: (くびをあらってまってろ) - just you wait; just wait and see; I'll show you
首を突っ込む: (くびをつっこむ) - to poke one's nose into another's affairs/to have a hand in/to take a (deep) interest in/to meddle in; to poke one's head (into a room)
首を絞める: (くびをしめる) - to wring the neck; to strangle
首を縦に振る: (くびをたてにふる) - to nod one's head; to nod yes; to agree
首を縮める: (くびをちぢめる) - to duck one's head
首を長くして: (くびをながくして) - looking forward; expectantly; eagerly
首上: (くびかみ) - neckband; round upright collar (on some traditional Japanese clothing)
首付き: (くびつき) - appearance of one's neck
首位: (しゅい) - first place; head position; leading position
首位打者: (しゅいだしゃ) - the leading hitter
首位攻防戦: (しゅいこうぼうせん) - {sports} game or series of games between the first and second place teams
首元: (くびもと) - base of the throat; bottom of the neck
首切り: (くびきり) - decapitation/beheading; firings/dismissals/layoffs/downsizing; small samurai sword used for decapitation
首切る: (くびきる) - to behead/to decapitate; to fire/to dismiss
首吊り自殺: (くびづりじさつ) - suicide by hanging
首唱者: (しゅしょうしゃ) - first proponent; initiator and advocate (e.g. of a theory)
首回り: (くびまわり) - around the neck; neck size (measurement)
首塚: (くびづか) - burial mound for severed heads
首実検: (くびじっけん) - identifying a severed head; checking a person's identity
首実験: (くびじっけん) - identifying a severed head; checking a person's identity
首尾: (しゅび) - issue; course of events; beginning and end
首尾一貫: (しゅびいっかん) - (yoji) consistent; unchanging from beginning to end
首尾貫徹: (しゅびかんてつ) - (yoji) (logical) consistency; coherence; unchanging from beginning to end
首巻: (くびまき) - comforter; muffler; neckerchief; scarf; neckwear
首巻き: (くびまき) - comforter; muffler; neckerchief; scarf; neckwear
首席: (しゅせき) - head/chief; (主席 only) chairman/governor/president; (首席 only) top student/head of the class; top seat/first desk (in orchestra)
首座: (しゅざ) - seat of honor; seat of honour; head of the table; head
首懸: (こうがけ) - leather strap put across a horse's neck
首斬り: (くびきり) - decapitation/beheading; firings/dismissals/layoffs/downsizing; small samurai sword used for decapitation
首斬る: (くびきる) - to behead/to decapitate; to fire/to dismiss
首根っこ: (くびねっこ) - the scruff or nape of the neck
首楞厳経: (しゅりょうごんきょう) - Suramgama Sutra
首相: (shushou) - Prime Minister, Chancellor (Alemanha, Áustria, etc.), Premier
